Class SimpleGrammar

  • java.lang.Object
    • lsystem.SimpleGrammar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Grammar

    public class SimpleGrammar
extends java.lang.Object
implements Grammar
    Implements Grammar interface SimpleGrammar class that provides convenience method for working with l-systems
    Author:
    Martin Prout
